TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit GroupDescription extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

Docs.summary: Provides an abstract base class for types that describe how to divide the items in a collection into groups.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets a custom comparer that sorts groups using an object that implements <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>.
Docs.value: A custom comparer that sorts groups using an object that implements <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > Setting the custom comparer object will clear previously set <xref:System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription.SortDescriptions%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object GroupNameFromItem (object item, int level, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GroupNameFromItem(object item, int32 level, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed

Docs.param: The item to return group names for.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> to supply to the converter.
Docs.summary: Returns the group name(s) for the given item.
Docs.returns: The group name(s) for the given item.

Docs.summary: Gets the collection of names that are used to initialize a group with a set of subgroups with the given names.
Docs.value: The collection of names that are used to initialize a group with a set of subgroups with the given names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You can add additional subgroups later if there are items that do not match any of the given names.

Docs.param: The name of the group to check.
The name of the item to check.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the group name and the item name match such that the item belongs to the group.
Docs.returns: if the names match and the item belongs to the group; otherwise, .
